Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement bitmask type_state for transaction processing phases

Database:
- tx_state_phase: Reference table for bit definitions \(11 phases\)
- fn_tx_state_helpers.sql: Helper functions \(set, clear, has, missing, get_phase\)
- sp_tx_shred_batch: Sets type_state=63 \(bits 0-5 for shredder phases\)
- sp_tx_detail_batch: Sets bit 6 \(64\) for DETAILED phase

Phase bit definitions:
  0=SHREDDED\(1\), 1=DECODED\(2\), 2=GUIDE_EDGES\(4\), 3=ADDRESSES_QUEUED\(8\),
  4=SWAPS_PARSED\(16\), 5=TRANSFERS_PARSED\(32\), 6=DETAILED\(64\),
  7=TOKENS_ENRICHED\(128\), 8=POOLS_ENRICHED\(256\), 9=FUNDING_COMPLETE\(512\),
  10=CLASSIFIED\(1024\)

Python:
- tx_state.py: TxState class with constants and helper methods

Backfill: 132,566 existing tx records updated with correct type_state

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\Users\wgadb\source\repos\T16O" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor tx_state from VARCHAR to BIGINT bitmask

Database schema:
- Dropped old tx_state VARCHAR column
- Renamed type_state â†’ tx_state \(BIGINT UNSIGNED\)
- Simplified indexes

Stored procedures:
- sp_tx_shred_batch: Uses tx_state = 63 for shredder complete
- sp_tx_detail_batch: Sets tx_state |= 64 for DETAILED bit

Python workers:
- guide-shredder: Uses bitmask check for DETAILED \(64\)
- guide-producer: Queries \(tx_state & 63\) = 63 AND \(tx_state & 64\) = 0
- guide-funder: Inserts tx_state = 1 \(SHREDDED bit\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Bash(/dev/null <<'EOF'
-- Check tx_transfer for this token by date
SELECT 
    'tx_transfer' as source,
    DATE\(FROM_UNIXTIME\(tx.block_time\)\) as tx_date,
    COUNT\(*\) as cnt
FROM tx_transfer t
JOIN tx ON tx.id = t.tx_id
WHERE t.token_id = 54452
GROUP BY DATE\(FROM_UNIXTIME\(tx.block_time\)\)
ORDER BY tx_date DESC
LIMIT 30;
EOF)

- Add publish_cascade_to_enricher\(\) function

  Producer batch â†’ Shredder â†’ Detailer/Funder/Aggregator â†’ Enricher

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\wgadb\\source\\repos\\T16O" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add correlation_id tracking and pass funder_addresses through cascade

Request tracking:
- Add correlation_id column to tx_request_log with index
- Gateway sets correlation_id = request_id for REST requests
- Correlation_id flows through entire cascade chain
- New endpoint GET /api/pipeline/<correlation_id> for aggregated status

Funder fix:
- Shredder queries addresses needing funding \(init_tx_fetched = 0\)
- Pass full addresses in cascade \(not IDs\) to avoid DB lookups
- Funder accepts ''funder_addresses'' key from cascade batch

Worker updates:
- Producer: Pass correlation_id to shredder cascades
- Shredder: Extract correlation_id, pass to gateway cascade
- Aggregator: Pass correlation_id to enricher cascade
- All workers log correlation_id in output

Pipeline status response example:
{
  "correlation_id": "abc123",
  "overall_status": "processing",
  "progress": {
    "producer": {"completed": 1, "total": 1},
    "shredder": {"completed": 8, "total": 10},
    "funder": {"completed": 5, "total": 8}

- Simplify on_message\(\) to call process_signatures\(\)
